alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 05 at 3:19AM CST until December 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Kittson County. In North Dakota, Towner, Cavalier, Pembina, Benson, Ramsey, Eddy, Nelson and Western Walsh Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Subfreezing road and air temperatures may create slick travel this morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
